00001 # Apache/Senayan settings:
00002 # by Hendro Wicaksono
00003 
00004 # Protect files and directories from prying eyes.
00005 <FilesMatch "\.(engine|att|inc|info|install|module|profile|test|po|sh|.*inc.php|.*pdf|.*sql|theme|tpl(\.php)?|xtmpl|svn-base)$|^(code-style\.pl|Entries.*|Repository|Root|Tag|Template|all-wcprops|entries|format)$">
00006   Order allow,deny
00007 </FilesMatch>
00008 
00009 # Don't show directory listings for URLs which map to a directory.
00010 Options -Indexes
00011 
00012 # Follow symbolic links in this directory.
00013 Options +FollowSymLinks
00014 
00015 # Force simple error message for requests for non-existent favicon.ico.
00016 <Files favicon.ico>
00017   # There is no end quote below, for compatibility with Apache 1.3.
00018   ErrorDocument 404 "The requested file favicon.ico was not found.
00019 </Files>
00020 
00021 # Set the default handler.
00022 DirectoryIndex index.php
